ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lake rathe
ygData.msgSnippet: Look at: http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/Songs/Song18.htm for strategy.  When I talked to this bard, she told me all-instrument attacks potentially do more damage
ygData.messageBody:
Look at:

http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/Songs/Song18.htm

for strategy. When I talked to this bard, she told me
all-instrument attacks potentially do more damage than
any warrior could do. Since she was soloing aviaks
that conned yellow to us both, I was pretty impressed.


I am not yet at the point where I can do this...but
Lake Rathetear would be a great place for bard AOE
attacks since there are virtually no wandering mobs in
most parts of the zone.



--- James <manickd@...> wrote:
> Ya but what song combo do I use?
>
> > The first bard I ever saw in combat was in lake
> > Rathe...she was a wood elf, 19th lvl and using the
> > classic all instrument attack to much better
> effect
> > than my 19th lvl druid could have done.
> >
> > She saved my life twice that morning and I was so
> > impressed with the way she played, I decided to
> make
> > up a bard too.
> >
> > --- Junka <andre.junqueira@...>
> wrote:
> > > I could solo them at 19. They arent easy, you
> have
> > > to use your songs
> > > wisely, otherwise it will be a long way to zone
> > >
> > > Ericka, the sexyest bardess in Prexus
> > >
> > >
> > > At 01:36 31/03/00 -0500, you wrote:
> > > >Was wondering if any one here has taken there
> bard
> > > to kill avick guards. If
> > > >any one has. Could you please tell me what
> level
> > > they could solo one and
> > > >what tactics they used. This is my first times
> > > playing a bard! Over my
> > > >shaman the songs are kinda a strange to me!
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >Vandle the Bard of Innourkk
>
>
>
